segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have stayed for 6 day.Here is your bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is the cash.Can you look after my baggage for a while ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Surely of course . But you have to be back by 5 o'clock , otherwise we will charge you 10 $ .
segments.speaker: S1
